data.lyric:
[ti:Closer (2017年Billboard热门100歌曲|2017年Billboard最佳合作歌曲|2017年Billboard最佳舞曲/电子音乐歌曲)]
[ar:The Chainsmokers/Halsey]
[al:Closer]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Closer - The Chainsmokers/Halsey
[00:02.65]Lyrics by：Andrew Taggart/Shaun Frank/Frederic Kennett
[00:05.30]Composed by：Andrew Taggart/Shaun Frank/Frederic Kennett
[00:07.95]Produced by：The Chainsmokers/Shaun Frank/Freddy Kennett
[00:10.61]Hey I was doing just fine before I met you
[00:14.74]I drink too much
[00:15.95]And that's an issue but I'm okay
[00:17.81]
[00:20.60]Hey you tell your friends
[00:23.46]It was nice to meet them
[00:24.86]But I hope I never see them again
[00:28.31]
[00:31.63]I know it breaks your heart
[00:33.17]Moved to the city in a broke down car
[00:35.28]And four years no calls
[00:37.56]
[00:38.15]Now you're lookin' pretty in a hotel bar
[00:40.37]And I I I can't stop
[00:43.34]
[00:45.61]No I can't stop
[00:48.40]
[00:50.50]So baby pull me closer
[00:52.23]
[00:52.78]In the backseat of your Rover
[00:54.72]
[00:55.36]That I know you can't afford
[00:57.12]
[00:57.88]Bite that tattoo on your shoulder
[00:59.75]
[01:00.32]Pull the sheets right off the corner
[01:02.36]
[01:02.91]Of the mattress that you stole
[01:04.64]
